title: 2-4Bed Available Rentals
posting_body: Properties consist of Single Family Homes, Condos & Apartments ranging from 2-5 Bedrooms from $2800 a month and up.
Properties are generally located in Master Planned Communities with shopping centers, schools and parks nearby.
Properties generally have Washer/Dryer hook-up, Dishwasher and Garage(House/Condo).
My clients move-in with 2-21 days of Tour.
Call or text 95I.7I0.632I today for more info & website.
***In today’s market you need to be EXTREMELY CREATIVE!
Areas I service are Fontana, Eastvale, Chino, Chino Hills, West Covina, Walnut, El Monte, Azusa, Duarate, Pasadena, Los Angeles, Pasadena, Hollywood, Anaheim, Santa Anna and the surrounding areas.
